alert.note: Alert for De Soto (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:56PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern De Soto Parish, southeastern Panola, Shelby and northeastern San Augustine Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 656 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tenaha, or near Center, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Center, Logansport, Tenaha, Timpson, Joaquin, Patroon, Shelbyville, Neuville, Huxley, Gary City, Stanley, Hurstown, James, Calgary, Jericho, Stockman, Arcadia, Woods, Jordans Store and Paxton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
